entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Bugs in `Console` members `KeyAvailable` and `ReadKey()` on Windows platform #102425
  • .NET 8 ComWrappers source generator doesn't handle _VTblGap* methods #102421
  • Why the D value of RSA is different #102418

Closed

  • System.Net.Http.HttpClient always fails on first attempted connection #95487
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [RISC-V] Fix few gcc build warnings for RISC-V #102426
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Simplify utf8.c #102424
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • forbid http request with invalid version #102423
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Delete empty DebugType property from test projects #102422
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • 2nd call to MemoryCache.Set() with the same key same size erases entry if cache is full #102420
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 125.0.6422.60, windows: 125.0.6422.60 #102417
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • Aging stacks #102415
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Implement WriteStringValueSegment defined in Issue 67337 #101356
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add System.Formats.Sse #102238
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Delete DebugSymbols=true setting for the repo build #102392
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Enable RPO-based block layout by default #102343
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for building CoreCLR for iOS/tvOS simulator #98127
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, community-contribution
  • Content-Length header not always returned when enumerating HttpContentHeaders #102416
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
